entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
